<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs=""
>
[Maneuvering Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2741) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Hardcover](/Sources.aspx?ID=193) pg. 223, [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 77</row>

**Archetype** [Sixth Pillar](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=94)

**Prerequisites**
[Sixth Pillar Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2739)

**Trigger**
You begin to Cast a Spell that requires at least 2 actions to cast.

</column>

---

You instantly tap into the magical power of a spell you're casting to quickly pounce around the battlefield. You Step, [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81), or [Stand](/Actions.aspx?ID=86). This action can be before or after you Cast the Spell.
name: Maneuvering Spell
